summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Federal Avenue, from East Prospect Street to Roanoke Street; by the construction of watermains together with fire hydrants and the necessary appurtenances, all in accordance with Resolution No. 8255 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of greementPayment by Bondsherefor.
